channel.title: Phishing, RedTeam and SE on Offensive Security Cheatsheet
channel.description: Recent content in Phishing, RedTeam and SE on Offensive Security Cheatsheet

item.title: Phishing Infrastructure (Gophish+Vultr)
item.description: General Informations # Using a specific and dedicated machine is a good choice. # It avoid being indexed and referenced as a phishing server for your own VPS # All the server configuration is pulled from the following Github repository # it provides a fully functionnal bash script to automate the process https://github.com/n0pe-sled/Postfix-Server-Setup # Generate typo & permutations on a domain name https://dnstwister.report/ Debugging Tips / Important notes Blacklisted/Spam domain # If the domain is blacklisted / considered as spam, you can try to reference www.
